raw_comment:
What do you notice?
I noticed that there are different percentages between the players of color and the head coaches of color. For player of color, they have a higher percentage then the head coaches of color.

What do you wonder?
I wonder why head coaches of color have a low percentage?

What impact does this have on you and your community?
This impacts on me because this shows to me that there is still racism going on. There should be a reason as to why head coaches of color have such a low percentage. This impacts the community because not so many head coaches of color have the opportunity to be involved in the major sports leagues. Which is unfair. 

What’s going on in this graph? Write a catchy headline that captures the graph’s main idea.
The Diversity in Sports
ace_sentences: There are different percentages between players of color and head coaches of color.
Players of color have a higher percentage than head coaches of color.
I wonder why head coaches of color have a low percentage.
This situation shows me that racism still exists.
There is a reason why head coaches of color have a low percentage.
Not many head coaches of color have an opportunity to be involved in major sports leagues.
The headline is: The diversity in sports.
